# resume(withParameters:)

**Instance Method**

Resumes a model update with updated parameter values.

## Declaration

```swift
func resume(withParameters updateParameters: [MLParameterKey : Any])
```

## Parameters

- **updateParameters**: Model training parameter values to replace those currently set in the update task.

## Discussion

Use this method to resume the model update task with newer parameter values. You use this method within the closures you provide in an [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLUpdateProgressHandlers] instance to resume the [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLUpdateTask].

## Starting and Resuming an Update

- **MLParameterKey**: The keys for the parameter dictionary in a model configuration or a model update context.
